researchers from Lady Irwin College in
New Delhi studied how om chanting can
Aid athletes a few years ago inspired by
such guru's remarks the study discovered
that athletes who used isha's own car
meditation were more aware of their body
hydration levels Dr Priti Rishi lal's
research in clinical and Sports
Nutrition was conducted over two months
in 2011. it will be presented at the
International Conference of food studies
in October in Illinois USA the study
also published in Ms anchal agarwal's
Master's thesis aimed to improve the
water drinking habits of young male
hockey players training with the Sports
Authority of India is part of its common
play program Ms Agarwal and Dr loud
discovered that despite educating
athletes about the importance of
drinking enough water during play most
players experienced dehydration during
the game with resulting in decreased
Performance and Physical capabilities
and substantial long-term Health
consequences according to Dr Lau quote
the players had already been educated on
the body's water needs they've been
given information as well as
experiential learning through Demos in
fact when we gave them a basic test on
their knowledge of body hydration most
of them scored a hundred percent they
knew what they should do but they were
just not doing it there was some
connection needed between knowledge and
actual change in Behavior a conscious
awareness of a body's thirst level was
needed end quote was on car the answer
ohm meditation has already been studied
for its physiological and psychological
effects Ms Agarwal and Dr Lau
distinguish how omkar meditation is
provided at eShop and elsewhere
according to Ms Agarwal quote while a
recent Indian study described arrived
ohm as a monosyllable om Isha Foundation
offers it as a tri-syllable end quote
Miss Agarwal refers to studies conducted
on the positive effects of shambafi
mahamudra quote yogic practices
containing Alm have been recently
reported to improve brain function end
quote this is one of the reasons why the
researchers chose own car meditation as
a tool for Bridging the Gap between
knowledge and behavior in their body
hydration study during the experimental
study 30 players were randomly assigned
to one of two groups a control group
that received the existing education
module on adequate water consumption and
an experimental group that received the
education module as well as practiced a
brief session of om car meditation for
21 minutes every day for 21 days at the
end of the 21 days tests revealed that
home car players had considerably
healthier hydration levels than the
control group this resulted in improved
performance of heart rate and Physical
Agility assessments the players also
said they felt happier calmer and more
focused Dr Lyle says quote many
participants came up to me and shared
that apart from their game performance
they were also experiencing other
benefits one participant told me he was
getting along better with everyone at
home they seemed to have matured a lot
during this study this study has opened
up a whole gamut of possibilities we've
already got two more studies plans to
find out more on the benefits of the
meditations that Isha offers end quote
